name: 皮尔斯·埃克曼
name_full: 皮尔斯·埃克曼 Pierce Eckmann

last_movies.title: 塔尔萨之王 第二季
塔尔萨之王 第一季

introduction: Pierce Eckmann is an American actor known for his recurring role as Cody Grieger in the television show Tulsa King (2022-2023), streaming on Paramount Plus. Pierce and his identical twin, Henry Eckmann, were cast as the twin grandsons of Dwight Manfredi played by Sylvester Stallone. Pierce has been privileged to work with Sly, Terrence Winter, Tatiana Zappardino, Loren Dunn, Freddie Poole, Dana Delaney, Scarlet Stallone, Guy Ferland and Lodge Kerrigan, among many other amazing talents. Pierce enjoys reading comic books, playing Minecraft, baseball and practicing Jiu Jitsu.
